title: Ep 225 | Phil Robertson and Adam Carolla Dismember Our All Woke, No Joke Culture
description:
Phil, Jase, and Al are joined by comedian Adam Carolla. Adam skewers the woke crowd's nonexistent sense of irony, discusses his atheism and how he relates to people of faith, and explains how Marxism is like a turbine car. The guys talk about comedy in the face of the cancel mob, how Adam's "No Safe Spaces" documentary foreshadowed the current cancel culture, and why a statue of any of them would be torn down. Adam's latest book is "I'm Your Emotional Support Animal: Navigating Our All Woke, No Joke Culture."
